Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In the past few days people have been busy speculating about what the Federal Budget might hold. Reports suggest that the government may be able to balance the nation's budget in nine years and they might increase taxes and reduce spending to achieve their goal. They are also investing $25 million to develop a new ward at the Royal Darwin Hospital while at the same time ending free heart health checks. Meanwhile it's rumored that the instant asset write-off may not be extended which could affect Aussie tradies. Lastly the Albanese government will roll out new measures in the May Federal Budget to force employers to pay their workers' super making cost-of-living a top priority.
